result.name: strategic-site-allocations-core-strategy-2014-policies-b3a-ke3a-ke4a-ra5
result.notes: Core Strategy adopted 2014 Policies B3A KE3A KE4A RA5. Defines the boundary of large strategic sites allocated principally for residential development on the edge of Bath, Keynsham and Whitchurch.

organization.name: bath-and-north-east-somerset-council
organization.title: Bath and North East Somerset Council
organization.description: BANES Council is a Unitary Local Government Authority covering Bath and the North East corner of Somerset, west of Bath, including Keynsham, Midsomer Norton, Radstock and Peasedown St John.

result.title: Strategic Site Allocations Core Strategy 2014 Policies B3A KE3A KE4A RA5
